name: Jazz Hole
description:
If you're having performance issues with the web version, try out one of our downloads!

Controls:

- Click on customers to talk to them

- Click on instruments on the stage to select them

- Use ASDFG to play notes on the Piano/Guitar

- Use left/right arrow keys OR A/D to move the trombone bucket. Hold SHIFT to move two lanes at a time. 

Tips:

The guidebook is an essential place to find relevant information on how to play. Basic information on moods / instruments can be found there. Additionally, many customers won't give you enough information to pick a proper instrument/mood combination and you have to peruse their profile or the news using the guidebook.
